VickyTennisBall.name: Vicky Tennis Ball
VickyTennisBall.description: High-quality tennis balls ideal for both casual and competitive matches. Designed for optimal bounce and durability, these balls provide a consistent feel and performance. Perfect for players of all skill levels who want to enjoy a reliable game.

CoscoCricketBat.name: Cosco Cricket Bat
CoscoCricketBat.description: Durable and lightweight cricket bat for all skill levels. Made from premium quality materials, it offers a perfect balance of power and control. Ideal for casual play and competitive matches alike, ensuring superior performance every time.

YonexShuttlecock.name: Yonex Shuttlecock
YonexShuttlecock.description: High-performance shuttlecocks designed for smooth flight and durability. Made to maintain consistency even in high-intensity games, these are ideal for both indoor and outdoor play. Trusted by players for their exceptional quality and reliability.

WilsonTennisRacket.name: Wilson Tennis Racket
WilsonTennisRacket.description: Premium tennis racket providing excellent power and control. Its lightweight design and advanced stringing technology make it a favorite for both amateur and professional players. Crafted for precision and comfort, this racket enhances your gameplay.

KookaburraCricketBall.name: Kookaburra Cricket Ball
KookaburraCricketBall.description: Professional-grade cricket ball designed for durability and performance. Crafted with high-quality leather, it offers excellent seam and swing for bowlers. Its robust construction ensures it withstands intense matches and retains its shape.

ToyCar.name: Toy Car
ToyCar.description: Miniature car model that kids love to race and collect. Designed with intricate details and vibrant colors, it's perfect for hours of fun. A must-have for young car enthusiasts and collectors.

DollHouse.name: Doll House
DollHouse.description: Beautifully detailed dollhouse perfect for imaginative play. Includes accessories and furniture, creating a realistic miniature home. Encourages creativity and storytelling in children, making it a delightful gift.

ActionFigures.name: Action Figures
ActionFigures.description: Set of detailed action figures for exciting pretend play. Designed for durability, these figures feature movable joints for dynamic poses. Perfect for sparking creativity and storytelling in kids.

LegoBuildingSet.name: Lego Building Set
LegoBuildingSet.description: Classic Lego set for creative building and endless fun. Includes versatile pieces for crafting various structures and models. Encourages problem-solving, engineering, and imaginative play in children.

Canvas.name: Canvas
Canvas.description: High-quality canvas for painting and other artistic projects. Suitable for use with various paints such as acrylic, oil, or watercolors. Its sturdy surface ensures durability and supports vibrant artwork creation.

PaintBrushSet.name: Paint Brush Set
PaintBrushSet.description: Set of professional paint brushes suitable for various media. Crafted with durable bristles for precision and smooth application. Ideal for artists of all levels, from beginners to professionals.

AcrylicPaintSet.name: Acrylic Paint Set
AcrylicPaintSet.description: Vibrant acrylic paint set for artists and hobbyists alike. The colors are rich, blendable, and offer excellent coverage. Perfect for various surfaces including canvas, wood, and more.

SketchBook.name: Sketch Book
SketchBook.description: Premium sketchbook ideal for artists and designers. Its thick, smooth pages are perfect for pencil, ink, and light watercolor work. A must-have for capturing creative ideas on the go.

PrinterInkCartridge.name: Printer Ink Cartridge
PrinterInkCartridge.description: Reliable ink cartridge compatible with HP printers. Provides vibrant and long-lasting prints for documents and photos. Easy to install and designed for smooth, consistent performance.

A4PaperPack.name: A4 Paper Pack
A4PaperPack.description: Pack of high-quality A4 paper for everyday printing needs. Ideal for home, office, or school use with a smooth finish. Ensures clear and sharp printouts for all your projects.

LaserJetToner.name: LaserJet Toner
LaserJetToner.description: High-yield toner cartridge designed for Brother LaserJet printers. Produces crisp and professional-quality prints, even for high-volume use. A dependable choice for maintaining efficient workflows.

InkjetPrinterCartridge.name: Inkjet Printer Cartridge
InkjetPrinterCartridge.description: Premium inkjet cartridge for high-quality prints. Engineered for vibrant color and sharp text reproduction. Compatible with a wide range of Epson printers for hassle-free printing.

LeatherBoundDiary.name: Leather Bound Diary
LeatherBoundDiary.description: This elegant leather-bound diary features premium paper, making it perfect for journaling, planning, or note-taking. Its durable leather cover ensures long-lasting use.

PocketNotebook.name: Pocket Notebook
PocketNotebook.description: A compact and portable notebook designed for on-the-go ideas and quick notes. Its lightweight build makes it easy to carry anywhere.

HardCoverDiary.name: Hard Cover Diary
HardCoverDiary.description: This sturdy hard cover diary is ideal for daily journaling or planning. With its classic design, it suits both professional and personal use.

SpiralNotebook.name: Spiral Notebook
SpiralNotebook.description: Durable and versatile, this spiral notebook is perfect for jotting down notes, creating lists, or brainstorming ideas. It offers convenience and practicality.

ColoringBook.name: Coloring Book
ColoringBook.description: A fun and creative coloring book filled with exciting pages that engage kids. Perfect for nurturing artistic skills and creativity.

CrayonsPack.name: Crayons Pack
CrayonsPack.description: This vibrant crayon set offers a wide range of colors, perfect for drawings, art projects, and unleashing your child's imagination.

PlayDohSet.name: Play-Doh Set
PlayDohSet.description: A colorful and moldable Play-Doh set that inspires creativity. Kids can shape, build, and explore endless possibilities with this fun craft toy.

ToyBlocks.name: Toy Blocks
ToyBlocks.description: This building block set promotes creativity, fine motor skills, and problem-solving. Kids can build structures, vehicles, or anything they imagine.

ClassNotes.name: Class Notes
ClassNotes.description: An affordable notebook designed specifically for students, offering smooth pages for neat writing. Perfect for everyday classroom use.

LinedNotebook.name: Lined Notebook
LinedNotebook.description: This high-quality lined notebook provides a great writing experience. Ideal for taking notes, writing essays, or planning schedules.

SpiralBoundNotebook.name: Spiral Bound Notebook
SpiralBoundNotebook.description: Convenient and easy to use, this spiral-bound notebook is perfect for students and professionals who value organized notes.

Stapler.name: Stapler
Stapler.description: A sturdy and reliable stapler designed for both home and office use. Ensures smooth stapling without jamming issues.

PaperClips.name: Paper Clips
PaperClips.description: This pack of durable paper clips is perfect for keeping your documents neat and organized. Ideal for office or school use.

BinderClip.name: Binder Clip
BinderClip.description: Strong and versatile binder clips designed to securely hold stacks of paper. A must-have accessory for work or home offices.

GelPen.name: Gel Pen
GelPen.description: This gel pen delivers smooth writing with vivid ink colors. Its comfortable grip makes it perfect for long writing sessions.

BallpointPen.name: Ballpoint Pen
BallpointPen.description: A reliable ballpoint pen designed for everyday writing. Its consistent ink flow ensures smooth and neat writing.

FountainPen.name: Fountain Pen
FountainPen.description: Elegant fountain pen for smooth and expressive writing.

GeometryBox.name: Geometry Box
GeometryBox.description: Complete geometry set for accurate drawing and measurements.

SchoolBag.name: School Bag
SchoolBag.description: Durable and spacious school bag with multiple compartments.

PencilCase.name: Pencil Case
PencilCase.description: Compact pencil case to store pens, pencils, and other stationery.

Scissors.name: Scissors
Scissors.description: Sharp and durable scissors suitable for various uses.

StickyNotes.name: Sticky Notes
StickyNotes.description: Self-adhesive sticky notes perfect for reminders and marking.

Markers.name: Markers
Markers.description: Permanent markers with bold and vibrant colors.
